comments.body: Now the Sphinx has started detecting some extra typos.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +947,951 @@- [AIRFLOW-XXX] Fix Documentation for adding extra Operator Links (#6301)
- [AIRFLOW-XXX] Add section on task lifecycle & correct casing in docs (#4681)
- [AIRFLOW-XXX] Make it clear that 1.10.5 was not accidentally omitted from UPDATING.md (#6240)
- [AIRFLOW-XXX] Improve format in code-block directives (#6242)
- [AIRFLOW-XXX] Format Sendgrid docs (#6245)

comments.body:
```suggestion
- [AIRFLOW-2886] Generate random Flask SECRET_KEY in default config (#3738)
```
https://github.com/apache/airflow/pull/3738 overrides https://github.com/apache/airflow/pull/3729 and https://github.com/apache/airflow/pull/3651
I know but we still have the all commits in Changelog

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@- [AIRFLOW-2809] Fix security issue regarding Flask SECRET_KEY (#3651)
- [AIRFLOW-2884] Fix Flask SECRET_KEY security issue in www_rbac (#3729)
- [AIRFLOW-2886] Generate random Flask SECRET_KEY in default config (#3738)
- Add missing comma in setup.py (#12790)
- Bugfix: Unable to import Airflow plugins on Python 3.8 (#12859)

@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@* Fix missing ``on_load`` trigger for folder-based plugins (#15208)

* Fix password masking in CLI action_logging (#15143)
* Fix url generation for TriggerDagRunOperatorLink (#14990)
* Restore base lineage backend (#14146)

@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@* ``kubernetes cleanup-pods`` subcommand will only clean up Airflow-created Pods (#15204)
* Fix password masking in CLI action_logging (#15143)

* Restore base lineage backend (#14146)

@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@* Webserver: Sanitize string passed to origin param (#14738)

@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@* Bugfix: Plugins endpoint was unauthenticated (#14570)
* BugFix: fix DAG doc display (especially for TaskFlow DAGs) (#14564)

@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@* Fix statsd metrics not sending when using daemon mode (#14454)

comments.body:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +43,47 @@* BugFix: Fix TaskInstance API call fails if a task is removed from running DAG (#14381)
* Scheduler should not fail when invalid ``executor_config`` is passed (#14323)

@@ -1,1 +65,69 @@* Use ``libyaml`` C library when available. (#14577)
